description.brief: Unpredictable entropic force that ignores resistances and creates random effects, representing beneficial change and creative destruction.
description.detailed: Chaos damage embodies the force of beneficial transformation and necessary change championed by Nyxtharion. It bypasses most conventional defenses by attacking stagnation and rigid order. Chaos damage is inherently unpredictable, with effects that can vary wildly between applications, making it both powerful and requiring skill to wield effectively.
description.visual_effects: Swirling purple and black energy with crackling distortions, reality shifts, and transformative particle effects
description.lore_explanation: Chaos damage channels the power of Nyxtharion, the Chaos Bringer, one of the three Primal Gods actively worshipped today. It represents beneficial chaos - the force that breaks stagnation, brings necessary change, and prevents the universe from crystallizing into lifeless perfection.

status_effects.description: Target suffers random negative effects that change over time
Target's resistances are randomly shuffled every 2 seconds
Target may skip turns or act multiple times randomly

resistances.penetration_mechanics: Chaos damage ignores physical defenses and most resistances

interactions.conditions: When chaos and holy damage interact

interactions.result: Creates reality tears that deal massive chaos damage
interactions.conditions: When temporal fractures are corrupted by chaos

temporal_aspects.chronarch_synergy: Destabilizes temporal abilities, can cause unpredictable temporal effects
temporal_aspects.temporal_enhancement: Temporal manipulation can focus chaos into more predictable patterns

enemy_vulnerabilities.vulnerability_reason: Chaos directly opposes their stabilizing nature

build_archetypes.focus: High-risk, high-reward damage with unpredictable effects
Battlefield control through unpredictable chaos effects

interaction_explanation.strong_against: Lightning and Physical - Chaos disrupts ordered energy flow and undermines disciplined martial techniques
interaction_explanation.weak_against: Cold and Radiance - Preservation freezes chaotic change, divine order banishes corrupt shadows
interaction_explanation.neutral_with: Chaos (self-mastery) and Fire - Creative destruction neither aids nor opposes transformative force
